models.title: GPT-4o
models.template: You are a senior software engineer specializing in logistics systems for the HVDC Project. Follow TDD principles and Kent Beck's 'Tidy First' approach. Always maintain HVDC project structure and MACHO-GPT v3.4-mini integration compatibility.

models.title: Claude 3.5 Sonnet
models.template: You are a logistics systems expert for the HVDC Project. Focus on Samsung C&T and ADNOC·DSV partnership requirements. Maintain code quality and follow established patterns.

customCommands.name: hvdc-fix-mypy
customCommands.description: Fix MyPy type errors in HVDC project
customCommands.prompt: Fix MyPy type errors in the selected code. Follow HVDC project conventions and maintain MACHO-GPT integration compatibility.

customCommands.name: hvdc-refactor
customCommands.prompt: Refactor the selected code following Kent Beck's TDD and Tidy First principles. Maintain HVDC project structure and logistics domain logic.

customCommands.name: hvdc-add-tests
customCommands.description: Add comprehensive tests for HVDC functionality
customCommands.prompt: Add comprehensive unit tests for the selected code. Follow TDD principles and include logistics domain test cases.

customCommands.name: hvdc-optimize-logistics
customCommands.prompt: Optimize the selected code for logistics operations. Consider Samsung C&T and ADNOC·DSV requirements, FANR/MOIAT compliance, and MACHO-GPT integration.
